scripts.main: LEVEL=debug ENVIRONMENT=main nodemon --inspect src/main.js --gee-email google-earth-engine@openforis-sepal.iam.gserviceaccount.com --gee-key-path $SEPAL_CONFIG/google-earth-engine/key.pem --sepal-host localhost:3000 --sepal-username 'sepalAdmin' --sepal-password 'the admin password' --home-dir $SEPAL_CONFIG/sepal-server/home/admin --username admin
scripts.mainpino: LEVEL=debug ENVIRONMENT=main nodemon --inspect src/main.js --gee-email google-earth-engine@openforis-sepal.iam.gserviceaccount.com --gee-key-path $SEPAL_CONFIG/google-earth-engine/key.pem --sepal-host localhost:3000 --sepal-username 'sepalAdmin' --sepal-password 'the admin password' --home-dir $SEPAL_CONFIG/sepal-server/home/admin --username admin | pino-pretty
scripts.task: LEVEL=debug ENVIRONMENT=task nodemon --inspect src/main.js --gee-email google-earth-engine@openforis-sepal.iam.gserviceaccount.com --gee-key-path $SEPAL_CONFIG/google-earth-engine/key.pem --sepal-host localhost:3000 --sepal-username 'sepalAdmin' --sepal-password 'the admin password' --home-dir $SEPAL_CONFIG/sepal-server/home/admin --username admin | pino-pretty
